issue.title: [R] Find a way to make the size of our vignettes smaller
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15655](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15655). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Or move them such that they are on our website, but not shipped with the source package.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15655?focusedCommentId=17492012) by Dewey Dunnington (paleolimbot):*
I believe you can do:

```R

usethis::use_article("article-slug")
```

...which basically just creates vignettes/articles and adds articles to .Rbuildignore. I don't believe this changes the URL of any of the articles (but this needs to be validated).
